page.title: 19QUESTIONAIRE
page.content: The last questions we put to the residents were:{Do you feel that there {are enough amenities in the area?}and {If there were more amenities in the {area,would it improve or spoil the {area?} About two-thirds of the replies said that they were satisfied with the amenities.The rest were dissatisfied with them and offered suggestions as to what might improve matters.One of the main criticisms was, that there wasn't enough for the younger members of the community to get involved in; and due to the lack of a decent bus service,the youth of the village, unless ferried by parents, had nowhere to go.If a Village Hall was built this could be rectified,as a Youth Club could be set up. (continued on Page 20)
